gate.composite

Interface CompositeDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Object>, gate.Document, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.LanguageResource, gate.util.NameBearer, gate.Resource, Serializable, gate.SimpleDocument
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeDocumentImpl

    public interface CompositeDocument
extends gate.Document
    Composite document is a result of combining one or more documents altogether.
    Author:
    niraj
